LABEL: 0x25E
STRING: My name is Metarou.

LABEL: 0x2A1
STRING: %ZI'm just a normal second year student attending a private high school.

LABEL: 0x2FD
STRING: I don't have any particular skills, and my grades are merely average.

LABEL: 0x346
STRING: I'm one of those people who're lacking in personality and individuality.

LABEL: 0x393
STRING: Speaking of which, right now my classmates are racking their heads over their career paths after graduation.

LABEL: 0x3FB
STRING: We're still second years though.

LABEL: 0x420
STRING: I think it's a bit early to be thinking about our future...

LABEL: 0x483
STRING: Everyone's studying seriously, fearing a black mark on their report, so no one dares to stand out.

LABEL: 0x50C
STRING: I'm the same, but I don't think there's any point in thinking about the future.

LABEL: 0x584
STRING: Anyways I don't even know where to begin to think about the future.

LABEL: 0x5B7
STRING: Therefore, I'll just live each day as it comes.

LABEL: 0x5FE
STRING: Today, tomorrow, and certainly... in the years ahead.

LABEL: 0x699
STRING: And so begins another day. Another annoying day.

LABEL: 0x6F2
STRING: Morning. In the corner of the classroom.

LABEL: 0x72F
STRING: The annoying murmur of the class reaches my ears as I sat down at my desk.

LABEL: 0x79C
STRING: Classmate

LABEL: 0x7B2
STRING: "Hey, wasn't the Hanabishi Channel really funny last night?"

LABEL: 0x82D
STRING: Classmate

LABEL: 0x843
STRING: "For real! That was totes the verified U-tuber Cycoh%R(4,Saiko)-chan〜"%N

LABEL: 0x8B1
STRING: ...How boring.

LABEL: 0x8EE
STRING: Each one of my classmates is enjoying the daily life they've been given, without a care in the world.

LABEL: 0x95D
STRING: They're talking about stuff like the call with their boyfriend yesterday, or about the U-Tube channel they've been obsessed with lately.

LABEL: 0x9CE
STRING: What's the fun in that? I don't understand it.

LABEL: 0xA23
STRING: So in my heart, I looked at them with disdain.

LABEL: 0xA7E
STRING: ...Am I a pessimist? Yeah, I know that.

LABEL: 0xACB
STRING: But these superficial idiots aren't aware of my inner self.

LABEL: 0xB38
STRING: No, they simply aren't capable of noticing it at all.

LABEL: 0xB83
STRING: They all focus on looking pretty and presentable on the outside.

LABEL: 0xBD2
STRING: To them, "Metarou" is just an ordinary high school boy.

LABEL: 0xC43
STRING: Neither saint nor devil. Just a bland, generic person.

LABEL: 0xC9C
STRING: That's the way it's should be.

LABEL: 0xCE5
STRING: That's why I'm still pretending to be asleep.

LABEL: 0xD3A
STRING: To be seen as a normal person, I acted the part of "I stayed up late last night and didn't get enough sleep".

LABEL: 0xDB7
STRING: This is my way of living. There's no need to stand out in life.

LABEL: 0xE24
STRING: You know what they say, the nail that sticks up gets hammered down.

LABEL: 0xF28
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xF36
STRING: "Good morning, Metarou!"

LABEL: 0x10A7
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x10B5
STRING: "You've been staying up late again, haven't you? You're gonna get bags under your eyes if you keep that up!"

LABEL: 0x1277
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1285
STRING: "Hahaha, you're still as gloomy as ever."

LABEL: 0x1408
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1416
STRING: "Time to wake up, homeroom's about to start, you know."

LABEL: 0x1501
STRING: ...How noisy.

LABEL: 0x1524
STRING: I've got a lot on my mind right now.

LABEL: 0x1644
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1652
STRING: "...Eh? What did you just say, Metarou?"

LABEL: 0x172F
STRING: ...I messed up.

LIST.STRING: You're too loud. Are you my alarm clock?
You're just as carefree as ever today.

LABEL: 0x186E
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x187C
STRING: "Hmph. Metarou, you're too tactless, that's why you're not popular!"

LABEL: 0x197C
STRING: Leave me alone.

LABEL: 0x19B3
STRING: These are the two who came to wake me up.

LABEL: 0x19FB
STRING: Nana.

LABEL: 0x1A14
STRING: Annoying busybody, aka Friend #1.

LABEL: 0x1A5E
STRING: Yukimaru.

LABEL: 0x1A77
STRING: A very sensible and good person, aka Friend #2.

LABEL: 0x1AC8
STRING: Unlike me, they're cheerful and well suited to be called 'good-natured'.

LABEL: 0x1B26
STRING: They're more or less my childhood friends.

LABEL: 0x1B51
STRING: We used to play together a lot when we were little.

LABEL: 0x1B91
STRING: I don't know when,

LABEL: 0x1BBA
STRING: but after a certain point, I started to distance myself from the two of them.

LABEL: 0x1C21
STRING: To put it another way, they're the yang and I'm the yin.

LABEL: 0x1C78
STRING: Yukimaru and Nana have always been at the centre of attention, and it suits them well.

LABEL: 0x1CD9
STRING: On the other hand, I, who can't trust other people, grew up to be an introverted person who spends his time quietly by himself.

LABEL: 0x1DFC
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1E0A
STRING: "Looks like teacher's coming."

LABEL: 0x1F7F
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1F8D
STRING: "Oh, already. I'll see you later then."

LABEL: 0x20A0
STRING: And with that, they went back to their seats.

LABEL: 0x20F7
STRING: ...I wonder why Nana and the others are still talking to me.

LABEL: 0x2159
STRING: Are they taking pity on me because we're childhood friends?

LABEL: 0x217E
STRING: No, I know they don't think like that.

LABEL: 0x21D3
STRING: I'm sure the two of them get involved in my affairs because they really consider me a friend.

LABEL: 0x2238
STRING: It's because I've become a twisted person that I'm getting the wrong idea.

LABEL: 0x22B9
STRING: So sometimes I can't bear to look directly at them.

LABEL: 0x2310
STRING: To me, they are too dazzlingly bright.

LABEL: 0x2355
STRING: Even I can't tell when our paths first started to diverge.

LABEL: 0x23BE
STRING: But, the truth is...

LABEL: 0x23FB
STRING: I wanted to be like─

LABEL: 0x2536
STRING: Next thing I knew, school was out.

LABEL: 0x2577
STRING: Today, I had another unproductive day.

LABEL: 0x25D4
STRING: I walk the path to my house.

LABEL: 0x2613
STRING: I looked down instead of forward, the asphalt reflected in my eyes.

LABEL: 0x267E
STRING: After I get home, I do what needs doing, and then tomorrow comes again.

LABEL: 0x26ED
STRING: I live my life through the repetition of colourless days, trying to find meaning in a meaningless existence.

LABEL: 0x2778
STRING: Today, tomorrow, and certainly... in the years ahead.

LABEL: 0x27C9
STRING: Therefore─

LABEL: 0x2800
STRING: It was only by chance that I looked up at this point.

LABEL: 0x285A
STRING: At the edge of my vision,

LABEL: 0x2877
STRING: I saw a small child playing

LABEL: 0x28A1
STRING: where the sidewalk and the road meet.

LABEL: 0x28EC
STRING: The ball that the boy was holding rolled onto the road.

LABEL: 0x2949
STRING: And then, I saw a car coming this way.

LABEL: 0x29AE
STRING: The boy didn't notice it coming.

LABEL: 0x29F9
STRING: It's easy to predict what will happen next.

LABEL: 0x2A52
STRING: So, I...

LABEL: 0x2C47
STRING: Everything in my vision seems to be moving so fast, it's all a blur.

LABEL: 0x2C93
STRING: I can't move.

LABEL: 0x2CB4
STRING: I can't make a sound.

LABEL: 0x2CED
STRING: Intense pain washed over me.

LABEL: 0x2D32
STRING: Aah... I'm...

LABEL: 0x2D6D
STRING: Run over by a car.

LABEL: 0x2E14
STRING: What was I trying to do?

LABEL: 0x2E4E
STRING: This isn't like me at all.

LABEL: 0x2E77
STRING: Metarou isn't someone who would do something like this.

LABEL: 0x2ECA
STRING: I'm just a high school boy who lived a normal life and died a normal death.

LABEL: 0x2F37
STRING: There's no way I would try to do something 'special' like this.

LABEL: 0x2FB0
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2FBE
STRING: "Metarou!? Hey! Metarou, can you hear me!!"

LABEL: 0x301A
STRING: I thought I heard someone's voice.

LABEL: 0x3220
STRING: Ah... It's Yukimaru and Nana.

LABEL: 0x325A
STRING: Am I hallucinating?

LABEL: 0x3277
STRING: Why would both of them be here.

LABEL: 0x32C6
STRING: Why do they look like they're about to cry?

LABEL: 0x331D
STRING: So foolish.

LABEL: 0x3356
STRING: Wouldn't it be better to leave a cynical guy like me alone?

LABEL: 0x33AD
STRING: ...I gradually felt colder and colder.

LABEL: 0x33F8
STRING: Because it's so cold, I'd like to buy some warm cafe au lait to drink.

LABEL: 0x3509
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x3517
STRING: "Metarou! Don't die on me, hey!"

LABEL: 0x35F3
STRING: I can't hear what Yukimaru was saying over the sound of the sirens getting closer and closer.

LABEL: 0x367A
STRING: Shut up, I'm talking with Yukimaru right now.

LABEL: 0x36CD
STRING: Ah, come to think of it, I said you were too loud this morning, didn't I.

LABEL: 0x3726
STRING: Why did I say that back then?

LABEL: 0x3823
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3831
STRING: "Metarou... You can't die here..."

LABEL: 0x391B
STRING: Nana was crying.

LABEL: 0x395C
STRING: Right, I...

LABEL: 0x3999
STRING: I was dazzled by the brilliance of the two people who were my exact opposite.

LABEL: 0x39F4
STRING: %ZThose two were troublesome and annoying, but "special".

LABEL: 0x3A4F
STRING: I had always used the word "noisy" to describe it.

LABEL: 0x3AB2
STRING: But it was just a lie to deceive myself.

LABEL: 0x3B09
STRING: Even I can't tell when our paths first started to diverge.

LABEL: 0x3B72
STRING: But... the truth is...

LABEL: 0x3BAF
STRING: I wanted to be like you two.

LABEL: 0x3C06
STRING: Not a shadow, but a shining "light".

LABEL: 0x3C51
STRING: Hey, Yukimaru, Nana...

LABEL: 0x3C92
STRING: For a moment... was I... shining like you guys?

LABEL: 0x3CE9
STRING: If so, that's good...

LABEL: 0x3D30
STRING: Then, I closed my eyes.

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: BAD END「Yearning」

LABEL: 0x3FC9
STRING: These are the two who came to wake me up.

LABEL: 0x4011
STRING: Nana.

LABEL: 0x402A
STRING: Annoying busybody, aka Friend #1.

LABEL: 0x4074
STRING: Yukimaru.

LABEL: 0x408D
STRING: A very sensible and good person, aka Friend #2.

LABEL: 0x40DE
STRING: Unlike me, they're cheerful and well suited to be called 'good-natured'.

LABEL: 0x413C
STRING: They're more or less my childhood friends.

LABEL: 0x4167
STRING: We used to play together a lot when we were little.

LABEL: 0x41A7
STRING: I don't know when,

LABEL: 0x41D0
STRING: but after a certain point, I started to distance myself from the two of them.

LABEL: 0x4237
STRING: To put it another way, they're the yang and I'm the yin.

LABEL: 0x428E
STRING: Yukimaru and Nana have always been at the centre of attention, and it suits them well.

LABEL: 0x42EF
STRING: On the other hand, I, who can't trust other people, grew up to be an introverted person who spends his time quietly by himself.

LABEL: 0x4372
STRING: But I'm not ashamed of it.

LABEL: 0x43D1
STRING: Well, to tell the truth I wanted to be like you two.

LABEL: 0x4430
STRING: It's just that for me, their "light" is too bright and dazzling for me.

LABEL: 0x449D
STRING: It's not that I don't like them, but I'm not sure if I really want to be together with them.

LABEL: 0x450D
STRING: I think it's better to maintain our current distance than to have them get involved with me out of pity, or get too close and have a falling out.

LIST.STRING: Let me sleep a bit more...

LABEL: 0x46A4
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x46B2
STRING: "Sheesh, you said the same thing yesterday."

LABEL: 0x4831
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x483F
STRING: "But as usual you still manage to make it to school on time, you're so weird."

LABEL: 0x492B
STRING: I get to school an hour early every day and then sleep in.

LABEL: 0x497C
STRING: It's much better than being late, and those two will wake me up when it's time.

LABEL: 0x4A87
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4A95
STRING: "What are you talking about, you idiot? You'd be better off sleeping an hour longer at home!"

LABEL: 0x4C30
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4C3E
STRING: "Smart or not... you're completely hopeless without us."

LABEL: 0x4D34
STRING: ─The reason why I'm still involved with them is simply because of the benefits.

LABEL: 0x4DAC
STRING: By tagging beside them, who're in the centre of classroom society,

LABEL: 0x4DE1
STRING: I can fit naturally into it as well. It's a big advantage for me.

LABEL: 0x4E54
STRING: Without doing anything in particular, I fit in with the class, and I don't float on the edges like an outcast.

LABEL: 0x4ECD
STRING: Like this, I won't get into trouble or be bullied, most of my classmates will be allies rather than enemies.

LABEL: 0x4F4A
STRING: Now all I have to do is play the role of "Metarou" in such a way that the people around me don't feel uncomfortable.

LABEL: 0x4FC3
STRING: ──In this way, I make use of the two of them.

LABEL: 0x5004
STRING: It's the only way I can live a normal high school life.

LABEL: 0x5059
STRING: In the course of acting out my role, I'll tell a lie if necessary to maintain the facade of "Metarou."

LABEL: 0x50E2
STRING: I'm careful when I lie so as not to get caught. You just need to know who you're dealing with and mentally simulate your interactions with them beforehand.

LABEL: 0x5167
STRING: That's how I play the role of "Metarou."

LABEL: 0x51C0
STRING: I can't let them know who I really am.

LABEL: 0x5217
STRING: The only one who knows the real me is "her."

LABEL: 0x5314
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x5322
STRING: "I helped wake you up, so buy me something later."

LABEL: 0x54B7
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x54C5
STRING: "Me too, I'm curious about the new yakisoba bread that came in the other day!"

LABEL: 0x560A
STRING: See, like that.

LABEL: 0x5669
STRING: Ah, another annoying day begins.

LABEL: 0x56B4
STRING: I can't wait to meet her.

LABEL: 0x595C
STRING: I'm surrounded by white and green.

LABEL: 0x59A3
STRING: Here, in our secret garden.

LABEL: 0x59E4
STRING: Only Metarou and I know it.

LABEL: 0x5A29
STRING: It is a special place for just the two of us.

LABEL: 0x5ABA
STRING: I'm waiting for him every day.

LABEL: 0x5B01
STRING: For Metarou to come back here.

LABEL: 0x5B4E
STRING: He said yesterday that he's going to buy me a delicious croissant today.

LABEL: 0x5BBC
STRING: I like ones with chocolate on it,

LABEL: 0x5BF1
STRING: but I didn't go so far as to ask for that.

LABEL: 0x5C42
STRING: If it doesn't have chocolate on it, I'll tease him a little.

LABEL: 0x5CAA
STRING: But I'm happy

LABEL: 0x5CE7
STRING: with anything Metarou gives me.

LABEL: 0x5D20
STRING: Because there's nothing in here.

LABEL: 0x5D85
STRING: I can hear the sound of footsteps approaching.

LABEL: 0x5DC9
STRING: The same rhythm as always.

LABEL: 0x5DF0
STRING: The sound of happiness.

LABEL: 0x5E2B
STRING: "──Psico%R(4,Saiko)!"

LABEL: 0x5E66
STRING: My favourite voice and my favourite smile are approaching.

LABEL: 0x5F28
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x5F36
STRING: "Metarou, you were late today. I was getting worried."

LABEL: 0x5F8D
STRING: "Sorry, sorry, one of my classmates grabbed me for a moment."

LABEL: 0x6048
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x6056
STRING: "Mmmhmm, it's okay. You always think of me first, so I'm not mad at all."

LABEL: 0x60E9
STRING: Metarou cares for me more than anything.

LABEL: 0x6140
STRING: More than family, more than classmates, more than childhood friends.

LABEL: 0x618D
STRING: More than anyone else, I am always number one in his heart.

LABEL: 0x62BD
STRING: "As promised, I bought you a croissant. Here you go."

LABEL: 0x63AE
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x63BC
STRING: "Thank you. ...Hey, there's no chocolate?"

LABEL: 0x64B1
STRING: "Eh?"

LABEL: 0x6586
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x6594
STRING: "Geez, Metarou, you know I like sweet stuff? That's not very thoughtful of you."

LABEL: 0x6699
STRING: "S-sorry, I'll be careful the next time I buy something from..."

LABEL: 0x66FC
STRING: Metarou apologizes to me in a flustered manner.

LABEL: 0x6753
STRING: You take everything I say too seriously, you know. Metarou, you're so cute.

LABEL: 0x67C6
STRING: But you look sad, did I tease you too much?

LABEL: 0x68C3
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x68D1
STRING: "Heehee, I'm just kidding, I like anything that Metarou gives me."

LABEL: 0x69C4
STRING: "Ah, you're making fun of me again?"

LABEL: 0x6AA9
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x6AB7
STRING: "That's a secret! Thanks for the food!"

LABEL: 0x6B8E
STRING: One bite.

LABEL: 0x6BC1
STRING: Sweet. Delicious. Happiness.

LABEL: 0x6C0A
STRING: It's so delicious that I can't help but smile, and Metarou is smiling along with me.

LABEL: 0x6C71
STRING: The happiness that fills my mouth fills this empty place with a new colour.

LABEL: 0x6CE4
STRING: That's how happy I felt.

LABEL: 0x6D29
STRING: I was fulfilled.

LABEL: 0x6E06
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x6E14
STRING: "Delicious!"

LABEL: 0x6EDB
STRING: "Well, I'll get you another one later then."

LABEL: 0x6FC8
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x6FD6
STRING: "The chocolate ones?"

LABEL: 0x70B1
STRING: "Of course."

LABEL: 0x70EA
STRING: ...But Metarou sometimes makes a strange face.

LABEL: 0x7143
STRING: Not at me, but his eyes seem to be looking somewhere far away.

LABEL: 0x719C
STRING: Sad eyes, that don't seem to be looking at anything.

LABEL: 0x71F1
STRING: At such times, Metarou always looks lonely.

LABEL: 0x7244
STRING: Are you worried about something, or did something happen at school?

LABEL: 0x734D
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x735B
STRING: "Hey, Metarou, shall we hold hands?"

LABEL: 0x7438
STRING: When that happens, we hold hands.

LABEL: 0x7481
STRING: Metarou and I become one.

LABEL: 0x74D8
STRING: Metarou's warmth is transmitted to me, and I feel warm and fuzzy.

LABEL: 0x7537
STRING: When I tell him "it's all right", Metarou's face livens up.

LABEL: 0x75A6
STRING: Just as Metarou takes care of me, I will also take care of Metarou.

LABEL: 0x7619
STRING: Because I love Metarou very much.

LABEL: 0x76C7
STRING: While holding hands, we lie down together and sleep next to each other.

LABEL: 0x7726
STRING: We spend this time of irreplaceable happiness together.

LABEL: 0x7781
STRING: There are only the two of us here, Metarou and I, in a closed world of our own.

LABEL: 0x77F4
STRING: When I wake up, Metarou won't be here. But I dream about him and I being together, so that I won't miss him until I see him again.

LABEL: 0x788B
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x7899
STRING: "Metarou... I like you. I love you."

LABEL: 0x78E6
STRING: I will be with you as long as you want.

LABEL: 0x793B
STRING: So, good-night.

LABEL: 0x7BEC
STRING: For young me, home was like hell.

LABEL: 0x7C41
STRING: My father was not there.

LABEL: 0x7C80
STRING: I'm not sure if my mom was a... demon or a devil. But I'm sure she was inhuman.

LABEL: 0x7CEC
STRING: She hit me today too.

LABEL: 0x7D0F
STRING: Hit me a lot, as always.

LABEL: 0x7D49
STRING: ...It's always like this.

LABEL: 0x7D6E
STRING: When she gets stressed, she turns to booze, then beats me.

LABEL: 0x7DCD
STRING: The people around me don't notice that I'm crying on the inside because I hide it so well.

LABEL: 0x7E54
STRING: When in the world did I become like this?

LABEL: 0x7EAC
STRING: I don't even know what I'm doing anymore.

LABEL: 0x7EDB
STRING: This has become my daily life, now.

LABEL: 0x7F30
STRING: ─But on that day, something inside me just snapped.

LABEL: 0x7FDB
STRING: Night.

LABEL: 0x800C
STRING: I ran out of the house and spent some time at a neighbourhood park.

LABEL: 0x8067
STRING: For the younger me, there was nowhere to escape to.

LABEL: 0x80BE
STRING: This was the edge of the little world where I could walk by myself.

LABEL: 0x8116
STRING: Someday...

LABEL: 0x8131
STRING: As soon as my world gets bigger, I want to run away.

LABEL: 0x8196
STRING: Run away, run away─I just wanted to live a quiet life in the middle of nowhere.

LABEL: 0x81F7
STRING: That's all I was thinking about.

LABEL: 0x823C
STRING: That's when I met her.

LABEL: 0x832A
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x8338
STRING: "Hey, you. What are you doing here?"

LABEL: 0x8410
STRING: Under the moonlit night, standing quietly, there was a girl in green.

LIST.STRING: Why don't you tell me your name first?

LABEL: 0x855B
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x8569
STRING: "That's true, I'd better introduce myself first."

LABEL: 0x86F0
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x86FE
STRING: "I'm Psico%R(4,Saiko). And you are?"

LABEL: 0x87D5
STRING: ──That was how Psico%R(4,Saiko) and I met.

LABEL: 0x88C6
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x88D4
STRING: "I see, so you're Metarou."

LABEL: 0x8A53
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x8A61
STRING: "Hey, Metarou, why are you in this place, at this hour of night?"

LABEL: 0x8B62
STRING: It was hard... for me to stay at home.

LABEL: 0x8BB1
STRING: I told Psico why I was here.

LABEL: 0x8C14
STRING: About my family. About the hardships I endured at home. And how I finally couldn't stand it and ran away.

LABEL: 0x8C8B
STRING: I had just met her for the first time, but strangely enough, I couldn't stop talking.

LABEL: 0x8CF2
STRING: Come to think of it, I was already enraptured by Psico by this point.

LABEL: 0x8D4F
STRING: She listened patiently to my every word.

LABEL: 0x8D96
STRING: She held my hand, which was trembling from fright.

LABEL: 0x8DF3
STRING: She wiped away my bottomless tears.

LABEL: 0x8E3A
STRING: And shed tears of her own over my circumstances.

LABEL: 0x8E81
STRING: She looked straight at me, and me alone, and took in everything about me.

LABEL: 0x8F94
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x8FA2
STRING: "I see... Metarou had a tough time."

LABEL: 0x9125
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x9133
STRING: "In order to not let anyone take advantage of you, you had to kill your true self."

LABEL: 0x92BC
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x92CA
STRING: "You had to pretend to be something you're not in order to protect yourself."

LABEL: 0x9459
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x9467
STRING: "It was rough, wasn't it? You did well, Metarou."

LABEL: 0x95F2
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x9600
STRING: "But, it's okay now."

LABEL: 0x9773
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x9781
STRING: "Because you have me now."

LABEL: 0x9860
STRING: After saying that, Psico gently pats my head.

LABEL: 0x98BB
STRING: I don't know since when I've felt so warm before.

LABEL: 0x9918
STRING: Maybe it was the first time.

LABEL: 0x9967
STRING: That's how much Psico's warmth seeped into my heart.

LABEL: 0x9A70
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x9A7E
STRING: "Hey, Metarou."

LABEL: 0x9BEB
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x9BF9
STRING: "I'll show you where my secret base is."

LABEL: 0x9D35
STRING: Suddenly, she said she would take me to a secret place.

LABEL: 0x9D98
STRING: The place she took me to was a recently abandoned building.

LABEL: 0x9EE8
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0x9EF6
STRING: "This is a place no one knows about."

LABEL: 0xA071
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xA07F
STRING: "A special place for me alone."

LABEL: 0xA1F6
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xA204
STRING: "But starting today, it's a special place just for the two of us, for me and you."

LABEL: 0xA39D
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xA3AB
STRING: "So... Promise me."

LABEL: 0xA518
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xA526
STRING: "Don't bring anyone else here except me, okay?"

LABEL: 0xA6B7
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xA6C5
STRING: "This is already a world just for me and you alone."

LABEL: 0xA7AE
STRING: ─From that day on, it became a habit for me to go to that place.

LABEL: 0xA811
STRING: A secret place just for the two of us. A closed world just for Psico and I.

LABEL: 0xA872
STRING: When Psico and I go there...

LABEL: 0xA8BB
STRING: There we find an irreplaceable joy.

LABEL: 0xADC2
STRING: Under the deep blue starry sky.

LABEL: 0xAE03
STRING: A woman illuminated by the twinkling stars was talking with a girl.

LABEL: 0xAE86
STRING: "Here, for you."

LABEL: 0xAED9
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xAEE7
STRING: "What's this? ...Dice?"

LABEL: 0xAF58
STRING: "Yeah. If you're ever in trouble, try rolling these."

LABEL: 0xAFCB
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xAFD9
STRING: "...Do you really think I'm going to be convinced by this childish story?"

LABEL: 0xB06C
STRING: "Heehee. I didn't mean to make fun of you. If you're in trouble, don't you think it's a good idea to ask God for help?"

LABEL: 0xB115
STRING: "This six-sided cube always gives the right answer."

LABEL: 0xB19A
STRING: "We can't resist the fate that God has set for us. Because that's how he made it."

LABEL: 0xB23F
STRING: "But if you want to defy fate, you have to roll the largest number you can."

LABEL: 0xB2C4
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB2D2
STRING: "Largest number...?"

LABEL: 0xB333
STRING: "Did you know that when you add up the front and back of a die, it always comes out to the number seven?"

LABEL: 0xB3D2
STRING: "Seven. That's a number that's impossible to appear on a die."

LABEL: 0xB453
STRING: "But that 'impossible' part is what's important."

LABEL: 0xB4DA
STRING: "Please don't ever forget that."

LABEL: 0xB54B
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB5BC
STRING: "It's a magic charm. It won't do you any good if you forget it."

LABEL: 0xB641
STRING: "A charm to help you, someday, find happiness."

LABEL: 0xB6BE
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB6CC
STRING: "...Happiness, huh."

LABEL: 0xB721
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB72F
STRING: "Does such a thing really exist?"

LABEL: 0xB7A2
STRING: "Kyaha. You're thinking too hard, aren't you? I certainly think you are."

LABEL: 0xB827
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB835
STRING: "I don't know if I could ever be that optimistic."

LABEL: 0xB8BA
STRING: "That's not true at all. Happiness is in the end about you, it's all about what you decide in your heart."

LABEL: 0xB965
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB973
STRING: "Well, then... maybe I was once happy before."

LABEL: 0xB9EC
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB9FA
STRING: "Even now, I sometimes think about it."

LABEL: 0xBA63
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBA71
STRING: "It was a truly fulfilling and important time."

LABEL: 0xBAEA
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBAF8
STRING: "I regret that I didn't spend more time together with him."

LABEL: 0xBB75
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBB83
STRING: "Maybe you don't realize how happy you are until you've lost it."

LABEL: 0xBBFA
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBC08
STRING: "It's only when you can't get it anymore, when it's something you'll never get back again, that you finally realize it."

LABEL: 0xBC9D
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBCAB
STRING: "I'm always impulsive in my actions... and by the time I realize it later, it's too late."

LABEL: 0xBD4C
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBD5A
STRING: "I always feel like there's a hole in my heart, like I'm looking up at a gray ceiling."

LABEL: 0xBDDD
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBDEB
STRING: "Not going anywhere. Not becoming anything."

LABEL: 0xBE5C
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBE6A
STRING: "There are times when I just want to escape from here."
